attributes.action: Don't reopen school in May just because of economy.
attributes.additional_details: There is a news stating that schools might open by 11 May and the reason being economy. Just for the sake of economy students and teachers shouldn't be put at risk.  After school opening, parents will be allowed to go back to their works which means risking their lives too.  I urge to government to not open schools until the end of this pandemic.
